Index.meta_description: Welcome to Stories of Us, a platform where you can share your life's journey and connect with others. Explore a world of stories, find inspiration, and build meaningful connections.
Index.title: Stories of Us
Index.description: Welcome to Stories of Us, a platform where you can share your life's journey and connect with others. Explore a world of stories, find inspiration, and build meaningful connections.

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach. Garnered favorable responses from event attendees, resulting in a successful event with heightened participant engagement and increased brand visibility.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

Map.sort_tooltip: Enable location to sort by distance
Map.add_location_prompt: Click on the map to add a location
Map.signin_required: Please sign in to add a location.

Map.alert_add_stop_before_save: Add at least one stop before saving.

StoreList.empty_body: Try adjusting your search or filters

StoreSheet.add_description: You pinned a spot on the map. Fill in the details so others can find it.

LocationForm.name: Name
LocationForm.opening_hours_help: Use a simple range or add notes like "Weekends only".
LocationForm.notes_placeholder: What makes this place useful or special?
LocationForm.tags_placeholder: Add tags (comma or Enter to add)
LocationForm.tags_help: Paste multiple tags separated by commas or new lines.
LocationForm.amenities_placeholder: Add amenities (comma or Enter to add)
LocationForm.images_help: Paste one or many (comma/new-line separated). First image becomes the cover.

MapPopup.enable_location: Please enable location services to get directions

Greeting.error: Failed to fetch weather data. Please try again later.

AdminDashboard.sign_in_required: Please sign in to review submissions.
AdminDashboard.admin_required: You need admin access to moderate locations.
AdminDashboard.load_failed: We could not load the review queue. Try again or contact support.
AdminDashboard.no_pending_body: Everything submitted from the map has been reviewed. New requests will show up here automatically.
AdminDashboard.review_copy: Vet submissions coming from the public map before they appear to everyone.
AdminDashboard.queue_help: Avoid stale submissions by processing quickly.
AdminDashboard.last_synced_help: Manual refresh keeps the queue current.
AdminDashboard.dialog_message: You are about to {action} {location}. This action updates the public map immediately.
